resources.string:
Hello! 
My name is Zoya Khanam.
I am currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from Baderia Global Institute of Engineering and Management.
 I have interest in becoming an App Developer, I am currently working on my skill set. 
 I am currently learning Kotlin development. 
 I also have some knowledge of HTML, CSS, C++, DSA.
 I want to learn and grow my knowledge and make great applications.
